name: Let's Spot It!
description:
17 Package X 24 Photos = 408 Levels
Five Game Modes, tons of levels, and MORE coming soon!
19 Light Music

1. [Classic Game] traditional find the difference game
2. [Expert] inside the mirror and unique mask feature
3. [VS Mode] play together with your friends
4. [Challenge] Game Center Supported
5. [Endless] no time limit!!!
